Description: "The area to be processed. This layer is automatically displayed in the drop-down list from the list of QGIS vector layers
column3: you can use several options to add new AOI: 1 - create new AOI from the map extent using the "+" button; 2 - upload the existing AOI using the "+" button; 3 - upload AOI as a vector layer into QGIS; 4 - create a new layer using QGIS polygon tool; 5 - use the extent of the uploaded image. Select the one of them if the vector layer consists of several polygons."
you can select the following processing types (default list of processing scenarios): Building Detection

Description: "Base imagery to be processed. By default Mapbox is selected
column3: in the drop-down list you can also select satellite images of the MAXAR company. You can open your image through the additional options button."

Description: "This is dufault option. When processing is restarted using the same source of satellite images and the same processing area (the area must be identical to the old one)
column3: the images are not downloaded again
column4: but the ones downloaded during the previous processing are reused."

Description: "Automatic calculation of the area of the selected processing area."
"This area becomes active if processing is performed on the .tif file. Allows you not to create an additional vector layer processing area for this image but takes its extent."
"New processing start button. You will see a notification about the successful start of processing
column3: or about incorrectly selected parameters after clicking it. It will appear in the block for displaying and working with processing after a successful start of processing."

Description: "Sign out of the user's billing record."
"Button for deleting previously performed processing from the processings list."
